snippet: Seth Kugel, our Frugal Traveler columnist and blogger, is on a Los Angeles to New York flight -- in his very first business class seat! And, multitasker that he is, he's live-tweeting the experience.
abstract: Seth Kugel, our Frugal Traveler columnist and blogger, is on a Los Angeles to New York flight -- in his very first business class seat! And, multitasker that he is, he's live-tweeting the experience.

headline.main: Live-Tweeting: The Frugal Traveler's First Time in Business Class
